<TextLayoutLeft>

Rapidly build beautiful and accessible experiences. The If Design System kit for Adobe XD contains all resources you need to get started.

<div class="if alert-banner warning">

We are currently moving towards using Figma only, so this kit is no longer maintaned

</div>

</TextLayoutLeft>

## Get the kit

### 1. Install Adobe XD

<TextLayoutLeft>

To design with IDS you must have the most recent version of <a class="ids-doc" href="https://www.adobe.com/products/xd.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Adobe XD</a> installed.

</TextLayoutLeft>

### 2. Get access

<TextLayoutLeft>

To get access to the Adobe XD library, you have to send your email to Baļss, Oļegs on Teams or on [email](mailto:olegs.balss@if.lv) and you will get an invite to the If Design System library file on Adobe Assets.

</TextLayoutLeft>

## Setup

When you have access, follow these instructions:

### 1. Create a new file or open an existing one and press "+" or "Link Assets"

<TextLayoutLeft>
  <figure class="if">
    <img class="" src="/images/XD-1.png" />
    <figcaption class="if text caption">Press "+" or "Link Assets"</figcaption>
  </figure>
</TextLayoutLeft>

### 2. Select "Shared with you"-tab and then press on "If Design System"

<TextLayoutLeft>
  <figure class="if">
    <img class="" src="/images/XD-2.png" />
    <figcaption class="if text caption">Press "If Design System"</figcaption>
  </figure>
</TextLayoutLeft>

### 3. Assets added

<TextLayoutLeft>
  <figure class="if">
    <img class="" src="/images/XD-3.png" />
    <figcaption class="if text caption">Press "If Design System"</figcaption>
  </figure>
</TextLayoutLeft>

And you're done!

### Updating the components

<div class="if alert-banner warning">
  <span class="if heading smallest">Use this with caution!</span>
  <p class="if">
    It will immediately look different on the document which might change the
    design!
  </p>
  <p class="if">
    <strong class="if">
      In that case we encourage you to download the document and link it
      locally!
    </strong>
  </p>
</div>

#### 1. Press blue "Link"-button to update individual components or "Update all" to update all assets

<TextLayoutLeft>
  <figure class="if">
    <img class="" src="/images/XD-update.png" />
    <figcaption class="if text caption">Press "If Design System"</figcaption>
  </figure>
</TextLayoutLeft>
